summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5627 for the improvement of 28th Avenue, from East Jefferson Street to East Cherry Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74302 as amended by Ordinance No. 74356, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
